name: Twitter BootStrap for Prototype
descrip: For those developers that use PrototypeJS, Twitter Bootstrap requires the use of jQuery. If you do not want to load another library use this fork of Twitter Bootstrap.

name: Growler
descrip: Growler is a PrototypeJS based class that displays unobtrusive notices on a page similar to OSX Growl.

name: Wipes
descrip: Wipes is an add-on method for the Effect namespace in the Script.aculo.us library.

name: Watermark
descrip: Watermark is a PrototypeJS based class that emulates the HTML5 placeholder attribute for Internet Explorer.

name: FullColorPicker
descrip: PrototypeJS based color picker with fill HSB and RGB options of Adobe Photoshops picker
